text: I am looking to change the pagination on the Search Results page from “Previous and Next” to page numbers. Has anyone successfully made this update/ could point me in the right direction? Thanks!
Are you using the modules in the backend? you may have to clone that module and then edit the code to change those options.
lines 89 and 99 in the JS panel should be the ones your looking for
Make sure to clone the "search results" module and then edit those lines to change the text
If you want full pagination, you'll have to do some more significant rewrites
